participant_1.background:
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, because it helps me to stay positive and focused on raising my sons.
i would be honored to give my life for my country.
I'm a single night owl who enjoys my work.
I love gummy bears and never had kids.

content.text: Hi! I'm a single night owl who enjoys my work.
I'm also a night owl! I love to bake and bake a lot of cakes.
That sounds delicious! I do not have kids and I love gummy bears.
I love the sweet and juicy flavor of watermelon. It's so refreshing!
I love music that is upbeat and energetic. It helps me to stay positive and focused.
I don't consume caffeine because it affects my sleep. I like to bake, but I have to compromise my desire for a quiet home with my love of vintage cars.
I would be honored to give my life for my country. I'm an army veteran.
That's very honorable. I hide things from my family to protect them.
I'm glad we met! I'm sure we'll get along great.
Me too! I'm glad we have so much in common.
